name: Red Talisman - Life Force
description: Completely restores MP/HP when used. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: White Talisman -  Earth
description: Increases Earth attribute defense by 50 when used. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Echo Crystal - Kuraki Mai
description: Echo Crystal that plays Kuraki Mai's music. It can be used once every 40 seconds and disappears after being used

name: Rough Fire Ore
description: The power of fire increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of fire increases by 6 and water resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Rough Water Ore
description: The power of water increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of water increases by 6 and fire resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Rough Earth Ore
description: The power of the earth increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of the Earth increases by 6 and wind resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Rough Wind Ore
description: The power of wind increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of wind increases by 6 and earth resistance becomes strong if given to defensive armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Rough Dark Ore
description: Increases dark power by 5 when given to a weapon. Increases dark power by 6 and increases  Resistance to Holy when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Rough Holy Ore
description: Increases holy power by 5 when given to a weapon. Increases holy power by 6 and Resistance to Dark becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Dynasty Staff
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Dynasty Crusher
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nDecreases HP by 15% while increasing P. Atk. by 78 during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Dynasty Crusher
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Dynasty Crusher
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Critical by 164 when HP drops to 60% or lower. Increases damage inflicted during PvP
